title: 2-Story Townhome-Styled Unit w/Private Balcony + TONS of AMENITIES!
app_fee: $30 application fee per person over 18 years of age
posting_body: Welcome to the gated Beaumont Court community!
This property features 19 townhouse-style one-bedroom apartments, a fourplex, and a single-family home, a 24 unit community behind a gate at the end of E. 36th Street in Oakland.
Open concept living: Enter through the living room and into the dining room.
Full service kitchen is complete with stainless steel appliances: dishwasher, microwave, electric range + refrigerator and sits open to the eat-in dining room.
Make your way up the stairs to the bedroom, open flex space, and bathroom.
A sliding door on this second story gives you access to the private balcony.
It's a great space to call home!
Please email, text or call Jennifer for details if you are interested in this unique community.
Jennifer's information can be found below in the "CONTACT" section below.
▪ Open concept living, dining and kitchen areas on the ground level
▪ Spacious eat-in kitchen w/stainless steel appliances: dishwasher, microwave, refrigerator, electric range
▪ Bedroom (loft-style) plus office/flex space, bathroom & private deck upstairs
▪ Laminate flooring and tile throughout; carpet in bedroom
▪ High speed internet ready via Monkeybrains ($50 additional per month)
▪ 1 secure, off-street parking ($25 additional per month)
▪ Communal outdoor space w/lounge chairs, sitting chairs, tables, fire pits, umbrellas, and shade!
▪ Gated, Off-street parking - $75 per month additional
▪ Secure gated entrance into the community
▪ Secure parcel box on premise (additional cost per month)
Close to Grand Avenue Farmer’s Market
Short bike ride to Lake Merritt
1 secure, off-street parking ($75 additional per month)
1 cat OK with additional one-time deposit
